channel.title: Monitoring & Control: Budget on Repton Projects

item.title: Monitoring & Control: Budget
item.description: Project Budgets Create and maintain project cost plans. Control your project's finances Create individual cost plans for your project team, capital expenditure, external consultancy and general expenses. Free Trial » Track Total Costs Maintain forecast versus actual costs to track your project's current and outstanding spend. Free Trial » Cost Summaries View Finance or Forecast Versus Actual Summaries. Free Trial » Management Information Use the Status Reporting tool to automatically produce a finance status report.
